src.file.map
Class MapHeader

java.lang.Object
  src.file.map.MapHeader

public class MapHeader
extends java.lang.Object

The header structure for a Map file. Also contains the LevelHeaders for all Levels.

Field Detail

DATA_LENGTH

public static final byte DATA_LENGTH
The length of all data in the MapHeader.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PROGRAM

public static final int PROGRAM
The "Program" code for all NitsLoch file formats. In a big-endian file, this is equivalent to ASCII 'NITS'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FORMAT

public static final int FORMAT
The "Format" code for the Map format (as opposed to a Player file or other future additions). In a big-endian file, this is equivalent to ASCII 'LOCH'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

Constructor Detail

MapHeader

public MapHeader()
Empty constructor; creates an ArrayList of LevelHeaders. Most situations call for the program to set the member variables after creation.
